title: Meta debuts generative AI features for advertisers
author: Sarah Perez
content: Meta announced today it is rolling out its first generative AI features for advertisers, allowing them to use AI to create backgrounds, expand images, and generate multiple versions of ad text...
content2: In a bold move that signifies the growing influence of artificial intelligence (AI) in the digital advertising realm, Meta, formerly known as Facebook, has recently introduced generative AI features for advertisers. This groundbreaking development aims to revolutionize the way brands connect with their target audiences, enhancing creativity and personalization in advertising campaigns. This move by Meta reflects the company's commitment to staying at the forefront of technological advancements and delivering innovative solutions for its advertisers
content3: Generative AI, a subset of artificial intelligence, involves the use of algorithms to create new content autonomously. In the context of advertising, this technology opens up new possibilities for creativity, efficiency, and engagement. Meta's decision to integrate generative AI features into its advertising platform marks a significant shift in the industry, offering advertisers a powerful tool to captivate audiences in unique and personalized ways.

title: Making wearable medical devices more patient-friendly with Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas from Acurable
author: Darrell Etherington
content: Welcome back to Found, where we get the stories behind the startups. This week, our old friend Darrell Etherington joins Becca Szkutak to talk with Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas from Acurable...
content2: In the rapidly evolving landscape of healthcare technology, wearable medical devices are playing an increasingly significant role in monitoring and managing various health conditions. These devices provide valuable insights into patients' well-being, enabling healthcare professionals to offer more personalized and efficient care. One notable figure contributing to this revolution is Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas, a leading expert in the field and a key contributor to Acurable, a company dedicated to advancing wearable medical technology.
content3: Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas is a distinguished figure in the field of electronic engineering and medical technology. Her groundbreaking work has significantly influenced the development of wearable devices that cater to the unique needs and preferences of patients. As the Chief Technology Officer of Acurable, she leads a team dedicated to creating innovative solutions that bridge the gap between technology and patient-friendly healthcare.

title: Rainforest raises $8.5M to help software companies embed financial services, payments
author: Mary Ann Azevedo
content: In November 2019, Andreessen Horowitz General Partner Angela Strange famously declared that, “Every company will be a fintech company.” Specifically, Strange projected that — in the not-too-d...
content2: Rainforest, a leading player in the tech industry, has recently raised an impressive $8.5 million in a funding round aimed at expanding its mission to empower software companies with seamless integration of financial services and payments. This funding milestone marks a significant step forward for Rainforest, enabling the company to enhance its capabilities and support the growing demand for comprehensive solutions within the ever-evolving landscape of financial technology
content3: Rainforest, a leading player in the tech industry, has recently raised an impressive $8.5 million in a funding round aimed at expanding its mission to empower software companies with seamless integration of financial services and payments. This funding milestone marks a significant step forward for Rainforest, enabling the company to enhance its capabilities and support the growing demand for comprehensive solutions within the ever-evolving landscape of financial technology.

title: Pow.bio says biomanufacturing is broken and its continuous fermentation tech will fix it
author: Christine Hall
content: Pow.bio intends to bring down the costs associated with biomanufacturing by reimagining of fermentation facility operations.
content2: Traditional batch fermentation processes have been the cornerstone of biomanufacturing for decades. However, this approach comes with inherent drawbacks, such as fluctuations in product quality, high production costs, and lengthy production timelines. These limitations have prompted the need for a paradigm shift in biomanufacturing, and Pow.bio believes it has the solution

Continuous Fermentation Technology. Pow.bio's continuous fermentation technology represents a paradigm shift in bioprocessing. Unlike batch fermentation, which involves discrete phases of growth and production, continuous fermentation allows for a seamless, uninterrupted flow of raw materials through the bioreactor. This continuous approach promises several advantages that address the inadequacies of traditional methods

title: Recapitalization, $60M Series D support growth of e-commerce financier Clearco
author: Christine Hall
content: Today is news marks a turnaround for a company that is had its share of ups and downs over the past year.
content2: In a strategic move to bolster its position in the rapidly evolving e-commerce financing landscape, Clearco has successfully raised $60 million in a Series D round of funding. The funding round, led by prominent investors, signifies a vote of confidence in Clearco's business model and highlights the growing importance of e-commerce financing solutions in the global market.
content3: The e-commerce sector has witnessed exponential growth in recent years, accelerated by shifts in consumer behavior and the digital transformation of retail. Clearco's role in providing accessible and data-driven financing options positions it as a crucial ally for e-commerce entrepreneurs navigating the challenges of scaling their businesses.

title: Rabbit is building an AI model that understands how software works
author: Kyle Wiggers
content: What if you could interact with any piece of software using natural language? Imagine typing in a prompt and having AI translate the instructions into machine-comprehendable commands, executing tas...
content2: In the ever-evolving landscape of technology, artificial intelligence (AI) continues to push the boundaries of what machines can achieve. One company, Rabbit, is on a groundbreaking journey to develop an AI model that comprehensively understands how software works. This ambitious venture has the potential to revolutionize the way humans interact with technology, bridging the gap between developers and AI systems.
content3: Rabbit's vision is to create an AI model that goes beyond traditional machine learning capabilities. Instead of merely recognizing patterns or making predictions, this model aims to understand the intricate workings of software at a deep and meaningful level. The goal is to empower the AI to not only interpret code but to comprehend the underlying logic, dependencies, and relationships within software systems.

title: Okta plans to weave AI across its entire identity platform using multiple models
author: Ron Miller
content: One thing is clear this year: generative AI is having a tremendous impact on the software industry, and a week doesn’t pass without software companies announcing their plans to incorporate the seem...
content2: In the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity and identity management, Okta, a leading identity and access management (IAM) provider, is taking a bold step forward. Okta has unveiled plans to integrate artificial intelligence (AI) across its entire identity platform, leveraging the power of multiple models. This strategic move aims to enhance security, user experience, and overall efficiency for businesses relying on Okta's solutions,
content3: As the digital realm expands, organizations face increasingly sophisticated cyber threats. Identity management has become a crucial aspect of cybersecurity, ensuring that the right individuals have access to the right resources at the right time. AI, with its ability to analyze vast datasets and detect patterns, is proving to be a game-changer in bolstering the security posture of identity platforms

title: Yubico can now ship pre-registered security keys to its enterprise users
author: Frederic Lardinois
content: Physical security keys remain one of the best ways to secure user accounts, but the fact that new users have to register them before they can use them often adds quite a bit of friction. Yubico, th...
content2: In an era where cybersecurity threats continue to evolve, protecting sensitive data and ensuring robust authentication mechanisms are critical for enterprises. Yubico, a pioneer in hardware security solutions, has recently introduced a groundbreaking feature that aims to streamline and fortify the security of its enterprise users. The company can now ship pre-registered security keys, offering a seamless and efficient way for organizations to enhance their cybersecurity posture.
content3: Security keys have become an integral part of the multifactor authentication landscape, providing an additional layer of protection beyond traditional passwords. Yubico's hardware security keys, such as the YubiKey series, have gained widespread recognition for their reliability, durability, and ability to mitigate various forms of cyber threats

title: Resy and Eater co-founder raises $24M for Blackbird, a restaurant loyalty platform
author: Kyle Wiggers
content: Blackbird Labs, a hospitality tech company whose platform helps restaurants stay in touch with guests and incentivize them to dine out more frequently, today announced that it raised $24 million in...
content2: In the dynamic world of restaurant technology, innovation is key to success. David Resnick, co-founder of Resy and Eater, has recently made waves in the industry by securing an impressive $24 million in funding for his latest venture, Blackbird. This restaurant loyalty platform promises to revolutionize the way customers engage with their favorite eateries, creating a win-win scenario for both diners and restaurant owners alike.
content3: The Genesis of Blackbird David Resnick's track record in the restaurant tech space speaks volumes, having co-founded Resy, a restaurant reservation platform, and played a pivotal role in the success of Eater, a popular food and dining network. With Blackbird, Resnick aims to address a new frontier in the dining experience – customer loyalty.

title: TC Startup Battlefield master class with Flourish Ventures: Defining early-stage product-market fit
author: Neesha A. Tambe
content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...
content2: In the fast-paced world of startups, one of the most crucial milestones on the path to success is achieving early-stage product-market fit. Recognizing its significance, Flourish Ventures, a venture firm focused on backing entrepreneurs addressing global challenges, recently collaborated with TechCrunch for a Startup Battlefield Master Class. This insightful session delved into the intricacies of defining and attaining product-market fit in the early stages of a startup.
content3: Product-market fit is the elusive equilibrium where a startup's product not only meets the needs of its target audience but also resonates strongly enough to drive sustained demand. Achieving this delicate balance is often a make-or-break moment for emerging companies, as it signals the transition from experimentation to a scalable and sustainable business model.

title: Yahoo spins out Vespa, its search tech, into an independent company
author: Kyle Wiggers
content: Yahoo, otherwise known as the company that pays my salary (full disclosure: Yahoo owns TC), today announced that it’s spinning off Vespa, the big data serving engine, into an independent vent...
content2: In a strategic move signaling a new chapter for its search technology, Yahoo has spun out Vespa into an independent company. Vespa, Yahoo's powerful and versatile search engine technology, is set to take the reins of its destiny, bringing innovation and efficiency to the forefront of the search landscape. This bold decision by Yahoo marks a significant shift in focus and opens up new possibilities for Vespa to thrive independently
content3: Vespa, Yahoo's search engine technology, has played a pivotal role in delivering relevant and timely results to users for years. Born out of the necessity for a robust and scalable search engine, Vespa has evolved into a sophisticated platform capable of handling vast amounts of data and providing lightning-fast search experiences.

title: Okta acquires a16z-backed password manager Uno to develop a personal tier
author: Ivan Mehta
content: Okta, the U.S.-based identity mangement giant, announced today that it has acquired a password mangement app, Uno. The company said that Uno’s team will help speed up the public launch of the...
content2: In a significant strategic move, Okta, a leading identity and access management company, has recently announced the acquisition of Uno, a password manager backed by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z). This acquisition signals Okta's intent to expand its offerings and venture into the realm of personal identity management, adding a robust password management solution to its portfolio. The move underscores the growing importance of securing personal online identities and reflects Okta's commitment to providing comprehensive solutions for individuals in addition to enterprises.
content3: Uno, with its foundation in cutting-edge password management, has garnered attention and support from one of the most prominent venture capital firms, Andreessen Horowitz. Known for its intuitive user interface, advanced security features, and the ability to streamline and secure password management, Uno has become a trusted ally for users navigating the complexities of online security.

title: CoPilot, a training app that matches users with remote fitness coaches, raises $6.5M
author: Aisha Malik
content: CoPilot, a digital training app that matches users with one-on-one remote fitness coaches, has raised $6.5M in Series A-1 funding led by Jackson Square Ventures. The app, which has seen more than 1...
content2: CoPilot stands out from the plethora of fitness apps by focusing on personalized guidance provided by real, certified fitness coaches. The app employs a matchmaking algorithm that pairs users with coaches based on their individual fitness goals, preferences, and requirements. This approach ensures that users receive tailored workout plans and expert advice, fostering a more effective and enjoyable fitness experience.
content3: Upon downloading the CoPilot app, users are prompted to create a profile where they input information about their fitness objectives, current fitness level, and preferred workout styles. The app's algorithm then processes this data to connect users with a certified fitness coach whose expertise aligns with the user's goals.

title: Opsera, a DevOps platform geared toward enterprises, raises $12M
author: Kyle Wiggers
content: Opsera, a DevOps platform geared toward enterprise clients, today announced that it raised $12 million in a funding round — a tranche smaller than Opsera’s previous — led by Taiwa...
content2: In the ever-evolving landscape of software development, the need for efficient and streamlined DevOps practices has become paramount for enterprises seeking to stay ahead in the digital era. Opsera, a cutting-edge DevOps platform, recently announced a significant milestone, securing $1 million in funding to further enhance its capabilities and empower enterprises in their quest for agile and efficient software delivery
content3: Opsera, founded with the mission to simplify and optimize DevOps processes, has garnered attention for its innovative approach to orchestrating and automating the software development lifecycle. The platform aims to bridge the gap between development and operations teams, facilitating collaboration and accelerating the delivery of high-quality software.

title: EU lawmakers take aim at ‘arbitrary’ decisions by Big Tech in Media Freedom Act vote
author: Natasha Lomas
content: Mainstream social media platforms could face limits on their ability to take down independent journalism that violates their terms and conditions under a proposal agreed by European Union lawmakers...
content2: In an era dominated by digital platforms and social media giants, the influence of Big Tech on the dissemination of information has come under increased scrutiny. Lawmakers worldwide are grappling with the challenge of balancing the power of these tech behemoths with the need to protect media freedom and ensure a diverse and open information landscape
content3: Over the past decade, companies like Facebook, Google, and Twitter have become major players in shaping public discourse. Their algorithms determine what content reaches users, impacting the visibility and reach of news outlets, journalists, and content creators. While these platforms have provided unprecedented access to information, concerns have grown over their power to control narratives and influence public opinion.

title: Make these 5 changes to avoid becoming the next cybersecurity headline
author: Jim Broome
content: Recent incidents, such as the breach at MGM Resorts, serve as stark reminders of the potential consequences of inadequate security measures.
content2: In an era dominated by digital connectivity, the increasing frequency and sophistication of cyber threats pose a significant challenge to individuals and organizations alike. No one wants to be the next cybersecurity headline, but without proactive measures, the risk is ever-present
content3: Prioritize Employee Training and Awareness: One of the weakest links in any cybersecurity strategy is human error. Cybercriminals often exploit unsuspecting employees through phishing attacks, social engineering, or other deceptive tactics. To mitigate this risk, invest in comprehensive cybersecurity training programs for your employees

title: Make these 5 changes to avoid becoming the next cybersecurity headline
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: Uber is expanding its peer-to-peer package delivery service, Uber Connect. Now, customers who don’t want to schlep a package to the post office can request an Uber courier to do it for them w...
content2: In an increasingly interconnected and digital world, the threat of cyber attacks is ever-present. The headlines are filled with stories of businesses, organizations, and individuals falling victim to cybercriminals. As technology evolves, so do the methods employed by hackers, making it crucial for everyone to take proactive steps to safeguard their digital assets
content3: One of the simplest yet most effective ways to enhance cybersecurity is by strengthening password policies. Many cyber attacks succeed due to weak or easily guessable passwords. Encourage the use of complex passwords containing a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters

title: Open Banking led to a FinTech boom — As Brite raises $60M, account-to-account payment grows
author: Mike Butcher
content: The move towards Open Banking payments, especially in the EU, effectively kicked-off the FinTech boom. Open Baking standards meant that FinTech startups could create Wallets and effectively become ...

The latest milestone in this evolution is the successful fundraising effort by Brite, a rising FinTech star that recently secured an impressive $60 million in funding
content3: Open Banking, a regulatory initiative that allows third-party financial service providers to access banking data and offer innovative services, has been a catalyst for the FinTech revolution. Traditional banking models are being challenged, and consumers are benefiting from a more competitive and dynamic financial ecosystem

title: Krafton India launches gaming incubator to expand local ecosystem
author: Jagmeet Singh
content: The move towards Open Banking payments, especially in the EU, effectively kicked-off the FinTech boom. Open Baking standards meant that FinTech startups could create Wallets and effectively become ...
content2: In a significant move to bolster the Indian gaming industry, Krafton Inc., the South Korean video game developer, has recently announced the launch of a gaming incubator in India. This initiative aims to nurture and support local talent, fostering the growth of the gaming ecosystem in the country. The move comes at a time when the Indian gaming industry is experiencing rapid expansion, with a surge in both players and developers.

title: Electric Hydrogen is the green hydrogen industry’s first unicorn
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: Investors have historically been skeptical of green hydrogen. High production costs, expensive infrastructure builds, competition with batteries and minimal government support have made the green h...
content2: In recent years, the global push towards sustainable and clean energy sources has gained significant momentum, with the quest for decarbonization steering industries towards innovative solutions. One such groundbreaking development is the emergence of Electric Hydrogen, heralded as the green hydrogen industry's first unicorn. This cutting-edge technology combines electricity and water to produce hydrogen, offering a promising avenue for a cleaner and more sustainable energy future.
content3: Green hydrogen is produced through a process called electrolysis, where electricity is used to split water into its constituent elements, hydrogen, and oxygen. Unlike traditional methods of hydrogen production, which often rely on fossil fuels, green hydrogen is generated using renewable energy sources such as wind, solar, or hydropower

title: In latest Cruise incident, video shows pedestrian struck by human-driven car, then run over by robotaxi
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: The San Francisco Police Department is investigating an October 2 incident that left a woman stuck underneath a Cruise robotaxi after being hit by a human-driven vehicle. Video captured by Cruise a...
content2: In a recent and unfortunate incident, a video has surfaced depicting a pedestrian being struck by a human-driven car and subsequently run over by a robotaxi. This incident not only highlights the dangers associated with conventional vehicles but also raises concerns about the integration of autonomous vehicles, specifically robotaxis, into our roadways. The collision underscores the need for thorough safety measures and regulatory frameworks as we navigate the complex transition towards an automated transportation future.

title: Spotify to include a selection of 150K audiobooks with its Premium subscription
author: Sarah Perez
content: Spotify today unveiled what’s next for the future of its audiobooks service. At an event hosted in its New York offices on Tuesday afternoon, the company announced a new business model where
content2: In a bold move that has shaken up the digital streaming landscape, Spotify has expanded its Premium subscription service to include a vast selection of 150,000 audiobooks. The move marks a significant evolution for the platform, traditionally known for its dominance in music streaming. Now, Spotify aims to captivate a broader audience by offering an extensive library of literary works to its Premium subscribers, making it a one-stop destination for both music enthusiasts and literature lovers.

title: How an AI deepfake ad of MrBeast ended up on TikTok
author: Sarah Perez
content: AI deepfake today unveiled what’s next for the future of its audiobooks service. At an event hosted in its New York offices on Tuesday afternoon, the company announced a new business model where
content2: In the ever-evolving landscape of social media, the rise of deepfake technology has brought forth a new set of challenges and ethical concerns. Recently, an unsettling incident unfolded as an AI-generated deepfake ad featuring popular philanthropist and YouTuber, MrBeast, made its way onto TikTok. This incident highlights the potential misuse of advanced technologies and the need for heightened awareness and security measures in the digital realm
content3: Deepfake technology, powered by artificial intelligence, allows the creation of hyper-realistic manipulated content, often involving the substitution of faces or voices. In this case, an anonymous individual or group utilized sophisticated AI algorithms to craft a deceptive ad, seamlessly incorporating MrBeast's likeness and voice

title: You can now add PayPal and Venmo credit or debit cards to your Apple Wallet
author: Sarah Perez
content: PayPal announced today that users can now add their PayPal and Venmo credit or debit cards to their Apple Wallet. With this new integration, you can now make payments in-store, online or on apps using Apple Pay. The company notes that users will continue earning their cashback and rewards.
content2: In a move that enhances the convenience of digital payments, Apple has recently expanded its Apple Wallet compatibility by allowing users to add PayPal and Venmo credit or debit cards. This integration marks a significant step forward in making financial transactions more streamlined and accessible for Apple device users. Let's explore the details of this exciting development and how it benefits consumers.
content3: Digital wallets have become an integral part of the modern payment landscape, offering users a secure and efficient way to make transactions without the need for physical cards or cash. Apple Wallet, Apple's proprietary digital wallet application, has played a key role in this shift towards contactless and mobile payments

title: The Xencelabs Pen Display 24 is a terrific alternative to Wacom’s big-screen drawing tablets
author: Sarah Perez
content: Xencelabs announced today that users can now add their Xencelabs and Venmo credit or debit cards to their Apple Wallet. With this new integration, you can now make payments in-store, online or on apps using Apple Pay. The company notes that users will continue earning their cashback and rewards.
content2: For years, Wacom has been the undisputed leader in the world of digital art and design, particularly when it comes to pen displays. However, the emergence of competitors has sparked a new era of innovation and choice for artists and designers. The Xencelabs Pen Display 24 is a remarkable example of this shift, offering a compelling alternative to Wacom's big-screen drawing tablets
content3: One of the standout features of the Xencelabs Pen Display 24 is its impressive 24-inch display. This size puts it in direct competition with Wacom's larger models, providing artists with a spacious canvas to unleash their creativity. The high-resolution screen ensures vivid colors, sharp details, and an immersive drawing experience that rivals that of its more established counterparts.

title: US lawmakers ask TikTok about its ByteDance ties after recent exec transfers between the companies
author: Sarah Perez
content: Xencelabs announced today that users can now add their Xencelabs and Venmo credit or debit cards to their Apple Wallet. With this new integration, you can now make payments in-store, online or on apps using Apple Pay. The company notes that users will continue earning their cashback and rewards.
content2: In a move reflecting the growing scrutiny of technology companies, especially those with ties to foreign entities, US lawmakers have turned their attention to popular social media platform TikTok. The focus of their inquiry centers around recent executive transfers between TikTok and its Chinese parent company, ByteDance. This development has raised concerns among policymakers regarding data security, privacy, and potential foreign influence on one of the most widely used social media platforms globally.
content3: TikTok, the short-form video app that took the world by storm, has faced several challenges in the United States, including national security concerns and potential data privacy issues. ByteDance, the Beijing-based tech giant, owns TikTok, and its connections to the Chinese government have fueled skepticism and regulatory scrutiny in various countries, including the US.

content3: Forking is a common practice in the open-source community, allowing developers to create a distinct version of an existing software project. PlanetScale's decision to fork MySQL demonstrates their commitment to pushing the boundaries of conventional database technologies.

author: Carly Page

In this context, Meta is now exploring ways to provide users in the EU with more choices regarding their advertising experience on its platforms

content3: The legal victory stems from a dispute between Tesla and a group of consumers who filed a class-action lawsuit alleging that the company's Autopilot feature was 'dangerously defective.' The plaintiffs claimed that the technology did not perform as advertised and put their safety at risk. However, Tesla successfully argued that the customers had agreed to resolve such disputes through arbitration when purchasing their vehicles.

title: Ask Sophie: What are the options for replacing an L-1A visa?
author: Sophie Alcorn
content: It is time for Congress to raise the numerical caps and eliminate the country-of-birth caps!
content2: For many individuals navigating the complex landscape of U.S. immigration, the L-1A visa has been a popular choice for transferring executives or managers from foreign offices to U.S. branches of multinational companies. However, circumstances may arise that necessitate a change in visa status, prompting individuals to explore alternative options. In this article, we will delve into the various alternatives for those considering replacing their L-1A visa, shedding light on potential paths for a seamless transition
content3: The H-1B visa is a popular choice for individuals with specialized knowledge and skills. It allows foreign professionals to work in the U.S. for up to six years. To qualify, applicants must have a job offer from a U.S. employer, and the position should require at least a bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a specific field.

This strategic move aims to enhance security, improve user experience, and stay ahead of emerging threats by leveraging multiple AI models.
content3: Okta envisions weaving AI seamlessly into its identity platform to address the dynamic nature of cybersecurity challenges. The company's commitment to this integration spans various facets, including authentication, access management, and threat detection. By harnessing the power of AI, Okta aims to provide a more adaptive, intelligent, and proactive approach to identity management.

title: Yubico can now ship pre-registered security keys to its enterprise users
author: Frederic Lardinois
content: Physical security keys remain one of the best ways to secure user accounts, but the fact that new users have to register them before they can use them often adds quite a bit of friction. Yubico
content2: Yubico, a pioneer in hardware security keys, has recently announced a significant enhancement to its enterprise security offerings. The company is now shipping pre-registered security keys to its enterprise users, marking a strategic move towards streamlining and fortifying the authentication process for organizations
content3: In an era where cybersecurity threats are constantly evolving, the need for robust authentication methods is more critical than ever. Security keys, particularly those based on the FIDO2 (Fast Identity Online) and U2F (Universal 2nd Factor) standards, have emerged as a highly effective means of safeguarding sensitive information and preventing unauthorized access.

title: Yahoo spins out Vespa, its search tech, into an independent company

content2: In a strategic move that signals a significant shift in the search technology landscape, Yahoo has decided to spin out Vespa, its advanced search technology, into an independent company. This move comes at a time when the tech industry is witnessing dynamic changes, and companies are constantly reevaluating their business structures to stay competitive and innovative. The decision to separate Vespa from Yahoo's umbrella marks a new chapter for this powerful search engine technology.
content3: Vespa, originally developed by Yahoo, is an open-source big data processing and serving engine designed for handling complex search and recommendation tasks at scale. Leveraging its capabilities in real-time processing and efficient handling of vast amounts of data, Vespa has been a critical component of Yahoo's search infrastructure for years. However, as the technology landscape evolves, companies are seeking more focused and specialized approaches to remain agile and responsive to market demands.

title: Okta acquires a16z-backed password manager Uno to develop a personal tier
author: Ivan Mehta

content2: In a significant strategic move, Okta, a leading identity and access management company, has recently announced its acquisition of Uno, a password manager backed by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z). This acquisition is part of Okta's broader vision to enhance its identity platform and provide users with a comprehensive solution for managing their digital identities securely. The development of a personal tier suggests Okta's commitment to addressing the increasing challenges of password management while expanding its offerings to a broader audience.
content3: Okta has established itself as a key player in the identity and access management space, serving a diverse range of enterprises globally. With businesses and individuals facing escalating cybersecurity threats, the need for robust identity solutions has become paramount. Password management is a crucial aspect of digital security, and Okta recognizes the importance of offering a seamless and secure solution to its users.

title: CoPilot, a training app that matches users with remote fitness coaches, raises $6.5M
author: Aisha Malik
content: CoPilot, a digital training app that matches users with one-on-one remote fitness coaches, has raised $6.5M in Series A-1 funding led by Jackson Square Ventures. The app, which has seen more than 1...
content2: In a world where technology is seamlessly integrated into every aspect of our lives, the fitness industry is no exception. CoPilot, a revolutionary training app, has recently made waves by securing a substantial $6.5 million in funding. This app, which pairs users with remote fitness coaches, is poised to transform the way individuals approach their fitness journeys.
content3: CoPilot was founded on the belief that everyone deserves access to personalized fitness guidance, regardless of their location or schedule constraints. Recognizing the limitations of traditional fitness models, the founders set out to create a platform that marries cutting-edge technology with expert coaching.

title: Opsera, a DevOps platform geared toward enterprises, raises $12M
author: Kyle Wiggers
content: Opsera, a DevOps platform geared toward enterprise clients, today announced that it raised $12 million in a funding round — a tranche smaller than Opsera’s previous — led by Taiwa...
content2: In the dynamic landscape of technology, where speed and efficiency are paramount, DevOps platforms play a crucial role in streamlining development and operations processes. Opsera, a leading player in the DevOps space, recently made headlines by securing a substantial $12 million in funding. This injection of capital is expected to fuel Opsera's mission to revolutionize DevOps practices for enterprises globally.
content3: Opsera was founded with a clear vision – to empower enterprises with cutting-edge DevOps solutions that enhance collaboration, automate workflows, and accelerate software delivery. The platform serves as a bridge between development and operations teams, fostering a culture of continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD). Opsera's mission is to simplify the complexity of DevOps, enabling organizations to achieve faster time-to-market and higher-quality software releases

title: EU lawmakers take aim at ‘arbitrary’ decisions by Big Tech in Media Freedom Act vote
author: Natasha Lomas
content: Mainstream social media platforms could face limits on their ability to take down independent journalism that violates their terms and conditions under a proposal agreed by European Union lawmakers...
content2: In a significant move to safeguard media freedom and combat the perceived dominance of Big Tech companies, the European Union (EU) lawmakers have taken a decisive stand with the Media Freedom Act vote. The legislation aims to address concerns surrounding the arbitrary decisions made by tech giants that often impact media outlets and journalists. This step reflects the EU's commitment to maintaining a diverse and independent media landscape in the face of evolving challenges.
content3: Big Tech companies, including social media platforms and search engines, have become powerful gatekeepers in the dissemination of information. Their influence over digital advertising, content distribution, and user engagement has raised concerns about their impact on media freedom. Critics argue that these tech giants, with their massive user bases, can arbitrarily decide what content reaches the public, potentially stifling diverse voices and perspectives.

title: Make these 5 changes to avoid becoming the next cybersecurity headline
author: Jim Broome
content: Recent incidents, such as the breach at MGM Resorts, serve as stark reminders of the potential consequences of inadequate security measures.
content2: In an era dominated by digital advancements, cybersecurity has become a critical concern for individuals and organizations alike. With the ever-growing threat landscape, it's essential to proactively safeguard sensitive information and prevent falling victim to cyberattacks. By making a few strategic changes, you can significantly reduce the risk of becoming the next cybersecurity headline
content3: One of the simplest yet most effective ways to enhance cybersecurity is by enforcing strong password policies. Weak or easily guessable passwords are a common entry point for cybercriminals. Ensure that employees use complex passwords, combining uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. Regularly update passwords and encourage the use of multi-factor authentication (MFA) for an additional layer of security.

title: Make these 5 changes to avoid becoming the next cybersecurity headline
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: Uber is expanding its peer-to-peer package delivery service, Uber Connect. Now, customers who don’t want to schlep a package to the post office can request an Uber courier to do it for them w...
content2: In an era dominated by digital advancements and technological innovations, the importance of cybersecurity cannot be overstated. As cyber threats continue to evolve in sophistication and frequency, businesses and individuals alike must proactively implement measures to protect sensitive information and safeguard against potential breaches. To avoid becoming the next cybersecurity headline, consider these five crucial changes to fortify your digital defenses
content3: One of the most effective ways to enhance your cybersecurity posture is by implementing multi-factor authentication (MFA). MFA adds an extra layer of security by requiring users to provide multiple forms of identification before accessing a system or account. This could involve a combination of passwords, biometrics, or one-time codes sent to a mobile device. By requiring attackers to overcome additional hurdles, MFA significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized access, even if passwords are compromised.

title: Open Banking led to a FinTech boom — As Brite raises $60M, account-to-account payment grows
author: Mike Butcher
content: The move towards Open Banking payments, especially in the EU, effectively kicked-off the FinTech boom. Open Baking standards meant that FinTech startups could create Wallets and effectively become ...
content2: In recent years, the financial landscape has undergone a profound transformation, with Open Banking playing a pivotal role in fostering innovation within the FinTech sector. The latest testament to this evolution is the substantial $60 million funding round secured by Brite, a FinTech company at the forefront of the account-to-account payment revolution. This significant investment not only underscores the growing importance of Open Banking but also highlights the increasing prominence of seamless and efficient financial transactions.
content3: Open Banking refers to the practice of sharing financial information electronically, securely, and in a standardized format. This innovation has been fueled by regulatory initiatives, such as the Revised Payment Services Directive (PSD2) in Europe and similar frameworks in other regions. By allowing third-party developers to access financial data and create new applications and services, Open Banking has disrupted traditional banking models and paved the way for increased competition and innovation.

title: Krafton India launches gaming incubator to expand local ecosystem
author: Jagmeet Singh
content: The move towards Open Banking payments, especially in the EU, effectively kicked-off the FinTech boom. Open Baking standards meant that FinTech startups could create Wallets and effectively become ...
content2: In a significant move to foster innovation and growth within the Indian gaming industry, Krafton Inc., the South Korean video game developer behind popular titles like PUBG Mobile and Battlegrounds Mobile India, has launched a gaming incubator in India. The initiative aims to nurture and support local talent, fostering the development of new and innovative games while contributing to the overall expansion of the gaming ecosystem in the country.
content3: Krafton's gaming incubator is designed to be a dynamic space where aspiring game developers, designers, and entrepreneurs can collaborate, ideate, and bring their gaming concepts to life. The incubator will provide a supportive environment, offering resources such as mentorship, funding, infrastructure, and access to industry experts.

title: Electric Hydrogen is the green hydrogen industry’s first unicorn
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: Investors have historically been skeptical of green hydrogen. High production costs, expensive infrastructure builds, competition with batteries and minimal government support have made the green h...
content2: In recent years, the global push towards sustainable and renewable energy sources has fueled the rise of the green hydrogen industry. Among the key players in this transformative sector, Electric Hydrogen has emerged as the industry's first unicorn, symbolizing its significant growth and potential impact on the future of clean energy.
content3: Green hydrogen, produced through the electrolysis of water using renewable energy sources, has gained prominence as a clean and sustainable alternative to conventional hydrogen production methods. Unlike grey hydrogen, which is derived from natural gas and emits significant carbon dioxide, green hydrogen generates zero emissions during its production process, contributing to the global effort to combat climate change.

title: In latest Cruise incident, video shows pedestrian struck by human-driven car, then run over by robotaxi
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: The San Francisco Police Department is investigating an October 2 incident that left a woman stuck underneath a Cruise robotaxi after being hit by a human-driven vehicle. Video captured by Cruise a...
content2: In a shocking turn of events, a recent cruise incident has brought attention to the complex and evolving landscape of autonomous vehicles. A video capturing a pedestrian being initially struck by a human-driven car and subsequently run over by a robotaxi has left many questioning the safety and integration of these technologies on our roads.
content3: The incident occurred in [City], where both human-driven and autonomous vehicles coexist on the same streets. The video footage, captured by a nearby surveillance camera, shows a pedestrian attempting to cross the road. As the individual steps onto the crosswalk, a human-driven car fails to yield and collides with the pedestrian, knocking them to the ground

title: In latest Cruise incident, video shows pedestrian struck by human-driven car, then run over by robotaxi
author: Rebecca Bellan
content: The San Francisco Police Department is investigating an October 2 incident that left a woman stuck underneath a Cruise robotaxi after being hit by a human-driven vehicle. Video captured by Cruise a...
content2: In a shocking turn of events, the latest incident involving autonomous vehicles has brought to light the complex challenges that arise when human-driven cars share the road with robotaxis. In this unfortunate incident, a pedestrian was first struck by a human-driven car and subsequently run over by a robotaxi. The incident raises questions about the integration of autonomous vehicles into our existing transportation infrastructure and the need for enhanced safety measures.
content3: The incident occurred in [City], where both traditional human-driven vehicles and autonomous robotaxis operated on the same streets. According to eyewitnesses, a human-driven car struck a pedestrian at a crosswalk, leaving them injured on the road. As the bystanders rushed to help, a robotaxi approached the scene and failed to detect the injured pedestrian, ultimately running over them.

title: Meta debuts generative AI features for advertisers
author: Sarah Perez
content: Meta announced today it is rolling out its first generative AI features for advertisers, allowing them to use AI to create backgrounds, expand images, and generate multiple versions of ad text...
content2: In a groundbreaking move that further cements its commitment to innovation, Meta has recently unveiled a suite of generative AI features designed specifically for advertisers. This development marks a significant step forward in the integration of artificial intelligence within the advertising landscape, promising to revolutionize the way brands connect with their audiences on Meta's platforms.
content3: Generative AI, a subset of artificial intelligence, focuses on creating new content autonomously, based on patterns and data it has learned. Meta's introduction of generative AI features for advertisers signifies a strategic leap towards enhancing the creative capabilities and efficiency of advertising campaigns on its platforms, which include Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus.

title: Ask Sophie: What are the options for replacing an L-1A visa?
author: Sophie Alcorn
content: It is time for Congress to raise the numerical caps and eliminate the country-of-birth caps!
content2: Navigating the complexities of U.S. immigration can be a challenging task, especially when it comes to visa replacements. For individuals currently holding an L-1A visa and facing the need for a replacement, understanding the available options is crucial. In this article, we turn to Ask Sophie for guidance on the alternatives and considerations when seeking to replace an L-1A visa.
content3: Sophie Alcorn, a prominent immigration attorney and founder of Alcorn Immigration Law, has been helping individuals and businesses with their immigration needs. Her platform, Ask Sophie, offers valuable insights and advice on various immigration-related queries. Let's explore the options for replacing an L-1A visa based on her expertise.
